Text:
Palestine: What a crock of shit.

Show me a Palestinian, and I'll show you an Egyptian, a Jordanian or a Syrian.
They kept his other torrents so yes, they objected. Gotta kuv ppl in the torent biz that suddenly decide they are going to be censors
Could someone pls seed this? there's 4 ppl waiting and we're stuck at 70%. And if you have any other works by Sacco pls upload them too. Thanks.

A wonderful piece of work and a landmark in documentary comics. You can love it even if you don't agree with all of it.

Read & seed.
